ai-pv47:1.2_0: strike them together with good friends,
ai-pv47:1.4_0: How is this gain for you, mind!
ai-pv47:2.1_0: This is the delightful mango grove
ai-pv47:2.2_0: all the grass and fruits in the wood.
ai-pv47:2.4_0: how is this gain for you?”
ai-pv47:4.1_0: “See it such a deed, look at this way,
ai-pv47:4.4_0: I will hear the hermits’ home.”
